name: Aunt Peggy's Sweet Potato Souffle
source_file: Aunt Peggys Sweet Potato Souffle (Paula Deen).txt
description: A classic Southern sweet potato casserole with a crunchy pecan topping.
ingredients: 3 cups cooked and mashed sweet potatoes (from about 2-3 small baked potatoes)
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400Â°F. Lightly grease an 8-inch square baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine the sweet potatoes, sugar, eggs, milk, 3 tablespoons melted butter, vanilla and salt. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish.
For the topping: Combine the brown sugar, 4 tablespoons butter (softened at room temperature), flour, and pecans in a separate bowl. Crumble the topping over the sweet potato mixture.
Bake until golden and set, about 20 minutes.
